sn2.17:4.1: Standing to one side, the god Subrahmā addressed the Buddha in verse:
sn2.17:5.5: If there is a state free of anxiety,
sn2.17:6.2: not without restraining the sense faculties,
sn2.17:6.3: not without letting go of everything,
sn2.17:6.4: do I see safety for living creatures.”
sn2.17:7.1: This is what the Buddha said. …
